GeneDef.label: very slow eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extreme issues eating food due to issues with their teeth. This means they will need to spend more time on break to consume their food.

GeneDef.label: slow eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues eating food due to issues with their teeth. This means they will need to spend more time on break to consume their food.

GeneDef.label: somewhat fast eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have slightly improved eating speed due to strong and sharp teeth, decreasing the amount of time they spend during their break eating food.

GeneDef.label: fast eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have improved eating speed due to strong and sharp teeth, decreasing the amount of time they spend during their break eating food.

GeneDef.label: very fast eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have significantly improved eating speed due to strong and sharp teeth, decreasing the amount of time they spend during their break eating food.

GeneDef.label: extremely fast eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extremely improved eating speed due to strong and sharp teeth, decreasing the amount of time they spend during their break eating food.

GeneDef.label: super fast eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have super improved eating speed due to strong and sharp teeth, decreasing the amount of time they spend during their break eating food.

GeneDef.label: hyper fast eating speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can consume food unbelievably quickly due to how strong and sharp their teeth are. I mean physics defyingly quick. Like, how?
